name: ca.bonspielgames.cortex
description:
Connect to BCI devices using an event based wrapper for the Emotiv Cortex API. Seamlessly subsribe to datastreams from multiple headsets simultaneously, handle in game training, profile management, and much more.

Built off of the official Emotiv support.

samples.description: basic example of using the Cortex functionality
set of sample vector graphics relevant to BCI
